properties.title: Getting High in Denver
properties.excerpt: <p>After the long drive across Kansas, we’re going to be really excited to see our first mountains from Denver.</p>

properties.title: Couchsurfing KC
properties.excerpt: <p>We’ll be couch-surfing in KC. Despite having made the long St. Louis &lt;–&gt; Denver drive multiple times during college, Michelle has only ever just stopped for barbecue here.</p>

properties.title: Return to St. Louis
properties.excerpt: <p>Michelle went to college at Washington University in St. Louis, but hasn’t been back since 2013. She’s excited to show Geoff the sites. Besides visiting the old stomping grounds, we’re going to climb at Climb So iLL (the climbing gym Michelle worked at during her last year), run around Forest Park, visit City Museum, and see the famous St. Louis Arch.</p>

properties.title: Stopping through Columbus, Ohio
properties.excerpt: <p>Second stop will be Columbus, Ohio. Neither of us have been here before. Michelle’s college friend Jess’s brother Zach will be hosting us. If you couldn’t tell yet, we’re pretty much couch-surfing across the country. Many thanks to all the friends who are graciously hosting us!</p>

properties.title: Making the blog in NYC
properties.excerpt: <p>This is my first post in the blog! I was really stoked to see that <a href="https://katydecorah.com">Katy Decorah</a> had already come up with a method for using <a href="https://katydecorah.com/code/jekyll-geojson/">Jekyll to cook up a geojson file</a>.</p>
